data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio dos Arcos have now been confirmed.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica starts the match. Moreirense with the kick-off in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 2, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Moreirense.
Diego Lopes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rio Ave.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Rio Ave.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 8, Bruno Moreira of Rio Ave is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Rio Ave close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Rio Ave in Vila do Conde.
Ball goes out of play for a Rio Ave goal kick.
In the minute 14, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Rio Ave throw-in in Moreirense's half.
Goal! Rio Ave have got their heads in front thanks to a Lucas Piazon strike.
Great play from Diego Lopes to set up the goal.
In the minute 16, Free kick Moreirense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Fabio Pacheco (Moreirense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Can Rio Ave capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Moreirense's half?
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Rio Ave.
In the minute 23, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Moreirense's Fabio Pacheco breaks free at Estadio dos Arcos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 26, Free kick Rio Ave.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Rio Ave in the half of Moreirense.
Moreirense's Pedro Nuno is whistled for offside at Estadio dos Arcos.
Moreirense have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 29, Moreirense push forward at Estadio dos Arcos and Felipe Pires gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Rio Ave defence.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Rio Ave have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Nahuel Ferraresi (Moreirense) gets a yellow card.
Rio Ave have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Corner awarded to Moreirense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Rio Ave a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Important block from the Moreirense defence as Pele fires in a strike for Rio Ave.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pele is booked for the home team.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Rio Ave awarded a free kick in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Vila do Conde.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Rio Ave.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Rio Ave.
Free kick Moreirense.
In the minute 45, Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Rio Ave with the kick-off.
In Vila do Conde Moreirense's Felipe Pires is caught offside.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 48, Carlos Mane of Rio Ave gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio dos Arcos.
Rio Ave to take a throw-in in Moreirense territory.
In the minute 49, Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Rio Ave drive forward but Bruno Moreira is judged offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In the minute 51, Moreirense's Filipe Soares misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 52, Rio Ave's Pedro Amaral gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Lucas Piazon for Rio Ave gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Felipe Pires for Moreirense drives towards goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 57, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In Vila do Conde, Fabio Pacheco of Moreirense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 57, Moreirense's Alex Soares has been booked in Vila do Conde.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Rio Ave in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a throw-in for Moreirense, close to Rio Ave's area.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Rio Ave.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Moreirense a goal kick.
Rio Ave's Bruno Moreira gets in a shot on goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Rio Ave.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the home team a throw-in.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 64, In Vila do Conde Moreirense attack through Felipe Pires. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vila do Conde.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Moreirense needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Rio Ave in the half of Moreirense.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Play has been interrupted briefly in Vila do Conde to check on Nahuel Ferraresi, who is grimacing with pain.
Moreirense's Nahuel Ferraresi is back in action after a slight knock.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Estadio dos Arcos.
In the minute 72, Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Rio Ave get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Moreirense's half?
Andre Pereira is on a sub for Bruno Moreira for Rio Ave.
In the minute 74, The away team have replaced Afonso Figueiredo with Anthony D`Alberto. This is the first substitution made today by Ricardo Soares.
Ricardo Soares is making the team's second substitution at Estadio dos Arcos with David Tavares replacing Fabio Pacheco.
Free kick for Rio Ave in their own half.
In the minute 75, Moreirense needs to be cautious. Rio Ave have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Moreirense in Vila do Conde.
In Vila do Conde Rio Ave drive forward through Lucas Piazon. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 77, Rio Ave awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Vila do Conde a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in Rio Ave.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Rio Ave in their own half.
Free kick Rio Ave.
Steven Vitoria (Moreirense) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 82, Rio Ave have been given a penalty at Estadio dos Arcos...
Goal! The home team extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a penalty from Lucas Piazon.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Rio Ave territory.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Rio Ave is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Moreirense throw-in in Rio Ave's half.
Rio Ave are coming forward and Andre Pereira gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 86, Moreirense have a goal kick.
Pedro Amaral gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rio Ave.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Rio Ave at Estadio dos Arcos.
Goncalo Franco is replacing Alex Soares for Moreirense at Estadio dos Arcos.
Moreirense make their fourth substitution with Ibrahima Camara replacing Pedro Nuno.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Rio Ave.
Tarantini is replacing Carlos Mane for the home team.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rio Ave's half?
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio dos Arcos the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Moreirense's Ibrahima Camara gets in a shot on goal at Estadio dos Arcos. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
The home team replace Diego Lopes with Chico Geraldes.
The home team replace Lucas Piazon with Ryotaro Meshino.
